title: (x) Vinny's New York Pizza & Italian Grill - Siena Black, Amazone {Patricia, Yves}
content: Can someone please help me with these fonts please? Thank you... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225125im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49424.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content:
New York Pizza etc is [Siena Black.](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225125/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atsiena-black/atsiena-black/testdrive.html?s=New+York+Pizza+Italian+Grill&p=36)   
   
The ampersand doesn't match and the word Pizza has been manually condensed.
